settings.max-file-size-help: If a log file exceeds this size, it will be split into multiple parts. Set to 0 to disable splitting. Default is 1MB. Maximum allowable size is 150MB.
settings.purge-days-help: Relies on the Flarum scheduler being active. 0 for disabled.

viewer.no_file_selected: Select a log file to view its content.
viewer.confirm_delete: Are you sure you want to delete this log file? This action cannot be undone.
